basic_static_string::basic_static_string (4 of 12 overloads)

Constructor.

Synopsis 
template<
    std::size_t M>
constexpr
basic_static_string(
    const basic_static_string< M, CharT, Traits >& other,
    size_type pos,
    size_type count);
Description

Construct with a substring (pos, count) of other.
